channel.title: A few things .
channel.description:
how do i go about making another save area? example i have this in my client [code] public int Mana; [/code] how would i save that? this is like pk points only different, it's a number value
how do i make items spawn on the ground?
how do i make npcs not able to walk thru objects?
thanks.
